name: Shopping Princess: Mall Model
description:
Do you like buying fashion? Shop with your own personal shopper stylist in the trendiest shops of the mall! Go shopping non-stop across your favorite fashion stores for girls! It does not matter whether your style is urban, sporty or classy: Shine like a fashion star with realistic top model outfits!
Personalize your fashion style with an incredible dress up, try a new makeup and hairdo and enjoy spending money in this shopping mall! Get the coolest outfits and a stunning new hair style in a super classy shopping mall full of surprises and fancy accessories!

Turn yourself into a top model fashion star with the help of our personal shopper in this funny shopping mall!
Dress up and make up to sparkle in front of the mirror: Find dresses, trousers, skirts, shoes, jewelry and many more clothes and accessories to find out your best outfit with the help of our personal shopper! Are you ready to find out the limits of shopping in the mall?

- Go to the spa to clean up and treat your face and body before you start with your makeup and outfit: Get facial treatments and relaxing massages and get ready for a new awesome makeup and hair style!
- Enter in the makeup salon where you will find the latest trendy makeup! Experiment with face tattoos and cool eyeliners, mascaras and lipsticks!
- Get your hair done with the advise of a hair stylist to mix and match your favourite hair styles!
- Choose new clothes with the help of our personal shopper and dress up in the latest fashion clothes to complete your new look!

Feel free to customize your look with countless combinations! How many colors can you combine?
Get a makeover and turn yourself into a fashion star in our shopping mall! Your expert personal shopper skills are finally about to pay off... Enjoy all the new fashion trends! Shopping is fun!
